tags.name: eco-json-schema-array
tags.description:
`eco-json-schema-array` takes in a JSON schema of type array and builds a form,
exposing a `value` property that represents an array described by the schema.

Please see the `eco-json-schema-object` documentation for further information.

  * `build-fieldset` {`CustomEvent<{ container: any; path: string; prefix: string; properties: any; type: string; value: any; }>`} -

  * `schema` - 

  * `__headings` {`any[]`} - 

  * `_template` {`HTMLTemplateElement | null`} - 

  * `_importPath` {`string`} - 

  * `rootPath` {`string`} - 

  * `importPath` {`string`} - 

  * `root` {`HTMLElement | ShadowRoot | StampedTemplate | null`} - 

  * `$` - 

  * `_overrideLegacyUndefined` {`boolean`} - 

  * `PROPERTY_EFFECT_TYPES` -

tags.name: eco-json-schema-file
tags.description:
`eco-json-schema-file` takes in a JSON schema of type number and string and
contains a `paper-input`, exposing a `value` property that represents the schema.

Validation is handled for strings and number/integers by mapping JSON schema
validation keywords to `paper-input` attributes; form elements will automatically
try and validate themselves as users provide input:

Please see the `eco-json-schema-object` documentation for further information.

Events:

  * `before-upload` {`CustomEvent<boolean>`} - 

Attributes:

  * `language` - 

  * `resources` - 

  * `schema` - 

  * `value` - 

  * `target` {`string`} - `target`

  * `accept` {`string`} - `accept`

  * `droppable` {`boolean`} - `droppable`

  * `drop-text` {`string`} - `dropText`

  * `multi` {`boolean`} - `multi`

  * `files` {`any[]`} - `files`

  * `raised` {`boolean`} - `raised`

  * `noink` {`boolean`} - `noink`

  * `headers` - `headers`

  * `retry-text` {`string`} - `retryText`

  * `remove-text` {`string`} - `removeText`

  * `success-text` {`string`} - `successText`

  * `error-text` {`string`} - `errorText`

  * `_shown-drop-text` {`boolean`} - `_shownDropText`

  * `additional` - `additional`

  * `file-data-name` {`string`} - `fileDataName`

  * `paper-button-alt` {`string`} - `paperButtonAlt`

  * `paper-button-title` {`string`} - `paperButtonTitle`

Properties:

  * `language` - 

  * `resources` - 

  * `schema` - 

  * `value` - 

  * `target` {`string`} - `target`

  * `accept` {`string`} - `accept`

  * `droppable` {`boolean`} - `droppable`

  * `dropText` {`string`} - `dropText`

  * `multi` {`boolean`} - `multi`

  * `files` {`any[]`} - `files`

  * `raised` {`boolean`} - `raised`

  * `noink` {`boolean`} - `noink`

  * `headers` - `headers`

  * `retryText` {`string`} - `retryText`

  * `removeText` {`string`} - `removeText`

  * `successText` {`string`} - `successText`

  * `errorText` {`string`} - `errorText`

  * `_shownDropText` {`boolean`} - `_shownDropText`

  * `additional` - `additional`

  * `fileDataName` {`string`} - `fileDataName`

  * `paperButtonAlt` {`string`} - `paperButtonAlt`

  * `paperButtonTitle` {`string`} - `paperButtonTitle`

  * `_template` {`HTMLTemplateElement | null`} - 

  * `_importPath` {`string`} - 

  * `rootPath` {`string`} - 

  * `importPath` {`string`} - 

  * `root` {`HTMLElement | ShadowRoot | StampedTemplate | null`} - 

  * `$` - 

  * `_overrideLegacyUndefined` {`boolean`} - 

  * `PROPERTY_EFFECT_TYPES` -
